title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.41 - Dispensing of potentially hazardous food
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.41 - Dispensing of potentially hazardous food

State Regulations

Potentially hazardous food is to be dispensed to the consumer in the individual, original container or wrapper in which it was packaged at the commissary or food-processing establishment. Potentially hazardous food is not to be dispensed from bulk supplies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
